level.text: 803.1 ABRA investigators or Metropolitan Police Department Officers (“MPDfficer”) shall issue citations, pursuant to D.C. Official Code § 25-801(b),or primary tier violations as follows:
For the first primary tier violation, the fine shall be $ 1000.
For the second primary tier violation within two years, the fine shall be $,000.
For the third primary tier violation in three years, the fine shall be $,000.
For the fourth or fifth primary tier violation in four years, the violationhall be referred to the Board for a show cause hearing pursuant to § 1604.
